name: DINDIGUL DISTRICT H.I.V. POSITIVE SOCIETY (DDS+)

address: Ram Petrol Bunk Backside, Palani Road

briefDescription: Dindigul District HIV Positive Soicety is a non-profit organization, (registration No: 6/2004) formed by, of and for People living with HIV/AIDS. The vision of organization is to improve the quality of life of people living with HIV/AIDS in Dindigul district. Totally 5748 persons living with HIV/AIDS registered in our organization.
